name: PHPOpenChat
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: PHPOpenChat is a high performance php-based chat server software for a live chat-room

matches.regexp:
(?-mix:[\s]+You don't read the INSTALL instructions!
[\s]+Use the PHPOpenChat-Installer<\/a>[\s]+to install and configure your chat\.[\s]+<\/body><\/html>)
